mapper.sql: ID, ORGCODE, ORGNAME, CONNAME, CONMOBILE, CONTEL, CONFAX, CONMAIL, ORGTYPE, PID, STATUS, CNAME, CDATE, UNAME, UDATE, NOTE, ORG_LEVEL
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_organs
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_organs (ID, ORGCODE, ORGNAME, CONNAME, CONMOBILE, CONTEL, CONFAX, CONMAIL, ORGTYPE, PID, STATUS, CNAME, CDATE, UNAME, UDATE, NOTE, ORG_LEVEL) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
